lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Thursday about the Yankees’ 9-2 victory over Texas misstated the inning during which the Yankees scored five runs. It was the seventh, not the eighth. And an Inside Pitch note with the article misidentified the Hall of Fame pitcher whom Andy Pettitte has tied for third place on the franchise’s career victories list. He was Lefty Gomez — not Lefty Grove, who pitched for the Philadelphia A’s and the Boston Red Sox.
